name: AdditionTutor
0:
”Alexa open addition tutor.”
”Alexa launch addition tutor.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: addition tutor
des:
Have Alexa help you learn addition!

Simply launch the skill and tell Alexa the number you want to work on. She will generate ten addition problems using that number. You can also ask for mixed numbers and she will generate random addition problems using the numbers 2 through 9.

After ten problems, Alexa will give you a summary of your results and review any problems that you missed.

To launch, simply say, "Alexa, open Addition Tutor."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
